level.heading: Disposition of forfeitures.
level.text: Forfeitures in the District of Columbia Police Officers and Fire Fighters' Retirement Fund established by ยง 1-712 shall not be applied to increase the annuity of a person, but rather, shall be applied to pay administrative expenses, if and as directed by the District of Columbia Retirement Board, or used to reduce the District's contributions.

level.heading: Effect of Amendments
level.text: The 2013 amendment by D.C. Law 19-314 added this section.
